text.section: There is a Small Employer Health Benefit Plan Premium Subsidy Program.
The Commission, in consultation with the Department, shall administer the Program.

The Program shall consist of subsidies, as provided under § 15-12A-03 of this subtitle, for:
small employers that have not previously offered a small employer health benefit plan to their employees; and
employees of small employers that have not previously offered a small employer health benefit plan to their employees.

Funding for the Program may be provided from:
general funds; or
the Health Care Coverage Fund established under Title 15, Subtitle 7 of the Health - General Article.

The Commission shall adopt regulations to establish:
the eligibility requirements for small employers under the Program; and
the level of subsidies to be provided under the Program.
